description_for_human: Real-time multiplayer party quiz game inspired by French TV quiz shows. Create rooms, form teams, and compete through 5 chaotic game phases with AI-generated questions.
description_for_model: Spicy vs Sweet is a web-based multiplayer party quiz game inspired by French TV quiz shows. Players join rooms using a 4-character code, form two teams (Spicy and Sweet), and compete through 5 game phases: Tenders (speed MCQ), Sucre Sale (binary choice), La Carte (menu selection), La Note (buzzer round), and Burger Ultime (10-question finale). Supports 2-20 players per room. Questions can be AI-generated using Google Gemini. Features food mascot avatars and a solo arcade mode with global leaderboard. Free to play. Available in 5 languages: French, English, Spanish, German, Portuguese.
